structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.text: [ Text of section added by 2011, 93, Sec. 83 effective July 1, 2012. See 2011, 93, Sec. 137.] The deputy court administrator for the district court department, as provided under section 1 of chapter 211B shall, subject to the superintendence authority of the supreme judicial court as provided in section 3 of chapter 211, have the power, authority and responsibility of a deputy court administrator as set forth in section 10 of chapter 211B.
